name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Maki Nishikino
text: 【AUTO】 ［Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room］ When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one character with "Change", reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Honoka Kosaka
text: 【AUTO】 ［(2)］ When a card named "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 0 or lower 《Music》 character, and put it on any position of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards, and that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Nozomi Tojo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, choose another of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power and soul +1 until end of turn. （The revealed card is returned to its original place.)

name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Umi Sonoda
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm ［(1) 【REST】 two of your characters］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Eli Ayase
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Rin Hoshizora

If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. name: "Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Nico Yazawa

If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)

text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】［(1) 【REST】 this card］ Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Student Council President, Eli
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "What I Really Want to Do" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +2500 power and your opponent cannot play event cards from hand. 【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)

name: Idol Otaku, Nico
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】［(2) Put a card from your hand to your waiting room］ When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Let's see～ my favorite food is～

name: Spiritual Power, Nozomi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is not a 《Music》 character, put that card into your clock. （If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place.)
flavorText: It's what the cards are telling me to do!!

name: Otonokizaka High 3rd Year, Nico
text: 【CONT】 If you would pay the "Change" cost for one of your characters, you may put a marker from underneath this card into your waiting room instead of a card from your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to two of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.

name: Otonokizaka High 3rd Year, Nozomi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)

name: Otonokizaka High 3rd Year, Eli
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, if the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is four or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Honoka: "You're tall, you have long legs, and you're beautiful, more than anything, you're so mature… I wouldn't expect less from a third year…!"

name: Club Leader, Nico
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose another character, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn.

name: Swimsuit Nozomi
text: 【AUTO】 Change ［(1) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Nozomi Tojo" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Maid Outfit Nico
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Work that Brings a Smile" is in your climax area, this card gets +5500 power until end of turn, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your waiting room.

name: Nico Likes Pranks
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: "Secrets" Nozomi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Tarot Reading" is in your climax area, choose up to one of your other characters, put it into your stock, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: I think I may have said too much. Don't tell anyone else.

name: Caring for Friends, Nozomi
text: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Otonokizaka High 3rd Year, Eli" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Otonokizaka High 3rd Year, Eli" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.）
flavorText: Even your desire to keep the school open comes from your sense of responsibility as the student council president?!

name: Alisa Ayase
text: 【ACT】［(1)］ This card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: "Khorosho" Eli
text: 【AUTO】 Change ［Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Eli Ayase" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Swimsuit Eli
flavorText: Maki seems hard to get along with.

name: Plotting Secretly, Nico
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Change ［(3) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Nico Yazawa" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: ……I thought this might happen, so I've already picked out an easily high-scoring song…

name: Maid Outfit Eli
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose a card in your clock, and return it to your hand. Choose a card in your hand, and put it into your clock.

name: Ascension
text: Search your deck for up to one card with "Change", reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards, and put this card into your memory.

name: Everyone at the Beach
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of cards in your stock.
flavorText: Umi: "P-Please don't do that, Nozomi… Nozomi!!"

name: Memories of That Day
text: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your opponent's deck. Put this card into your stock.

name: Work that Brings a Smile
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: What I Really Want to Do
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
We want you to sing with μ's.
As a School Idol!

name: Tarot Reading
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: What are you going to do?

name: Otonokizaka High 2nd Year, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Favorite Place" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two of your other characters, and those characters get +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Umi: "Are you listening? If the skirt doesn't at least reach my knees, I'm not wearing it. Understood?!"

name: Otonokizaka High 2nd Year, Umi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "You're the worst!" is in your climax area, choose a character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and all your 《Music》 characters get +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Secondary Leader Type, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] When you use "Change", if this card is 【STAND】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Energetic by Nature, Honoka
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］". 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "First Thoughts" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Driving Force Behind μ's, Honoka
text: 【AUTO】 Change ［Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Honoka Kosaka" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【AUTO】 Change ［(2) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""We Are Now Waiting In the Shining Light"μ's" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText:
Kotori, I'm sorry!
I want to keep being a School Idol!

name: True Japanese Lady, Umi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］". 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your 《Music》 characters] This card gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Waiting will only make it more painful.

name: Maid Outfit Umi
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage with "Honoka(穂乃果)" in its card name gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 Bond／"Driving Force Behind μ's, Honoka" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Driving Force Behind μ's, Honoka" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.）

name: Maid Outfit Honoka
text: 【AUTO】 ［Return two characters in your waiting room to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards］ When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Real Feelings, Kotori
text: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)

name: "Not Fair" Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Runaway Delusions, Umi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Daughter of a Japanese Confectionery, Honoka
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: "Minalinsky" Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 Change ［(1) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Kotori Minami" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Yukiho Kosaka
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Honoka(穂乃果)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power.

name: Childhood Umi
text: 【AUTO】 Change ［(2) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Umi Sonoda" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Makeshift Approach
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your characters with "Kotori(ことり)" in its card name in battle, and put it into your memory. At the beginning of your next draw phase, put that character from your memory on any position of your stage, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Climbing a Tree Together
text: Choose one of your 《Music》 characters in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Uncool Step
text: Deal five damage to your opponent. （This damage may be canceled）
flavorText: I see… I came up with that choreography…

name: First Thoughts
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. （【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: I'm going to do it. I'll do it!

name: Favorite Place
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: You're the worst!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I didn't think you were that kind of person.

name: Otonokizaka High 1st Year, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, if a card named "μ's Teammates" is in your climax area, and the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavorText: We'll send her off with a lively show!

name: Loves Idols, Hanayo
text: 【AUTO】 ［(2)］ When a card named "Declaration of Participation" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to three cost 0 or lower 《Music》 characters or "Alpaca", and put them on separate positions of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText: Is this the "Legendary Idol Legend" complete DVD box set? I've never met someone who owned this before!

name: Rin's Childhood Friend, Hanayo
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Great at Singing, Maki
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other characters you have is one or less, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power. 【CONT】 If you would pay the "Change" cost for one of your characters, you may put a marker from underneath this card into your waiting room instead of a card from your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Honoka: "Let the School Idol group, μ's, begin practicing."

name: Hanayo's Childhood Friend, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Change ［(2) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Rin Hoshizora" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Otonokizaka High 1st Year, Maki
text: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is six or more, this card gets -1 level in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Powerful Pride, Maki
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm ［(1)］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: "Secrets" Maki
text: 【AUTO】 Change ［(2) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Maki Nishikino" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)

name: Swimsuit Hanayo
text: 【CONT】 If you have other characters with "Rin(凛)" in its card name, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".

name: Maid Outfit Rin
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

name: Athletic Rin
text: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Swimsuit Hanayo" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Swimsuit Hanayo" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.）

name: Alpaca
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Loves Idols, Hanayo" get +1000 power.

name: Maid Outfit Hanayo
text: 【CONT】 If this card is on your center stage, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase.
flavorText: We're going to Akiba dressed like this?!

name: Otonokizaka High 1st Year, Hanayo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Change ［(2) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Our LIVE, the LIFE with You" Hanayo Koizumi" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Strong-minded Maki
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Music Room Girl" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get +1500 power until end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Rin During an Interview
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".

name: Smile! Push-ups!
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.

name: Childhood Dreams
text: Choose one of your 【STAND】 《Music》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: If you want to do it, do it… They're right…

name: Great Day for Practice?
text: Search your deck for up to two 《Music》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. Choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: μ's Teammates
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Declaration of Participation
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: But I believe I want to be an idol more than anyone else!

name: Music Room Girl
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: "Wonderful Rush" Umi Sonoda
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as【REST】.) 【ACT】 [(1)【REST】 two of your 《Music》 characters] This card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
To head towards the most interesting direction without turning away…
That could very well be Honoka's unique trait.

name: "Wonderful Rush" Eli Ayase
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to two of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I have decided to believe in everyone and work hard.

name: "Wonderful Rush" Maki Nishikino
flavorText: I'll do my best--- so cheer for me, alright?

name: "Wonderful Rush" Nozomi Tojo
text: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.)
flavorText: I hope that my power can reach everyone today---

name: "Wonderful Rush" Hanayo Koizumi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.

name: "Wonderful Rush" Rin Hoshizora
text: 【ACT】 [(1)] This card gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Singing and dancing just for you,
the cold just doesn't seem to matter anymore.

name: "Wonderful Rush" Kotori Minami
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: If a tiny smile can reach your heart.

name: "Wonderful Rush" Honoka Kosaka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Music》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: "Oh ,Love & Peace!" μ's
text: 【ACT】 When this card attacks, if a card name "Wonderful Rush" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +5000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Let's go! Towards a new future!

name: Wonderful Rush
flavorText: Come on, it's time to go!

name: We Are Now Waiting In the Shining Light
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
If we come together, we'll all become stronger.
For sure. We'll keep changing.

name: We Are Now Waiting In the Shining Light
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
That it's not just going to be fun. There will be trials, too.
That those hardships are part of our future.

name: We Are Now Waiting In the Shining Light
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Despite that we want to dream the big dream.
That's right here and it's beginning now.

name: Mini Eli
text: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)

name: Mini Umi
text: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)

name: Mini Nozomi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All if your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Shining Stage! μ's
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】 .)

name: Preparations for X'mas, Kotori & Honoka & Umi
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be 【REVERSE】 by your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects.
flavorText: Honoka: "Will Santa pay a visit to Honoka～?"

name: Runaway Delusions, Umi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Daughter of a Japanese Confectionery, Honoka
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Daughter of the Chairman, Kotori
flavorText: I thought my mom would be pretty sad, too…

name: "Not Fair" Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Climbing a Tree Together
text: Choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: First Thoughts
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. 【COME BACK】 When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: I'm going to do it. I'll do it!
